meanings.definition: The action or process of developing something again or differently.
meanings.sent1: The redevelopment of the old factory brought new life to the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The city council approved a plan for the redevelopment of the downtown area.
meanings.sent3: The redevelopment of the park turned it into a popular spot for families to enjoy picnics.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity sparked a redevelopment of the traditional recipe, making it a modern favorite.
meanings.sent5: The redevelopment of the website made it more user-friendly and attractive to visitors.

meanings.definition: The act of renovating or improving a building or area.
meanings.sent1: The community celebrated the successful redevelopment of the historic theater.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in the redevelopment of the office building to create a more efficient workspace.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected redevelopment of the playground surprised the children with new equipment.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for gardening led to the beautiful redevelopment of the backyard garden.
meanings.sent5: The city's redevelopment of the waterfront transformed it into a bustling tourist destination.
